data.title: Initial MVP Release
data.summary: Basic authentication, landing page, and changelog UI for FitMentor.

changes.title: User Authentication
changes.description: Sign up and login system with hashed passwords and JWT token generation.

changes.title: Landing Page (SSR)
changes.description: Fully responsive public-facing SSR homepage with branding.

changes.title: Changelog Page
changes.description: Beautiful MUI-based changelog page to showcase roadmap and progress.

data.title: Multi-Step Signup & Habit Tracking
data.summary: Introduced user profiling and initial habit tracking with offline support.

changes.title: Multi-Step Signup Flow
changes.description: Progressive onboarding asking for email, name, profession, and habits.

changes.title: Habit Tracker UI
changes.description: Basic daily habit inputs for calorie tracking and custom user habits.

changes.title: PWA Support
changes.description: Offline-first support using Progressive Web App capabilities.

data.title: LLM Integration & AI Habit Suggestions
data.summary: AI-driven features to suggest, improve, and analyze habits.

changes.title: LLM Chat Integration
changes.description: Ask questions and get feedback using AI chat (OpenAI / Gemini).

changes.title: Habit Suggestions via AI
changes.description: Based on user profile, suggest new relevant habits.

changes.title: Email Verification
changes.description: Send verification links to users via email.

changes.title: Validation & Rate Limiting
changes.description: Prevent abuse with API rate limits and DTO-based input validation.

data.title: Mobile Integration & Native Modules
data.summary: Added mobile-first features like screen time and steps tracking.

changes.title: React Native Modules
changes.description: Integrated Android/iOS native modules for screen time and step tracking.

changes.title: Focus Mode
changes.description: Temporarily disable distractions and gamify productivity.

changes.title: Daily/Weekly Reports
changes.description: User receives habit progress reports via email.

changes.title: Gamification
changes.description: Badges and streaks to encourage consistency.
